title: Any way i can get to the shop without going through the client?
body: Been on vacation for a few days, and will not be able to get to a computer till wednesday at the earliest. Would like to purchase one of the on sale champs that ends today. Any way we can make that happen?

replies.body: The shop only has items pertaining to the game, so we don't have anything built for you to access the store outside of the client.
